content:
PROCEDURE CODE
1222
The parties communicate to each other and to the liquidating notary copies of the documents to which they refer in the notarial phase of the judicial partition. The parties shall classify, number and list these documents in an inventory.
Unless all the parties agree otherwise, only the documents listed in the inventory of documents and communicated to the other parties and to the liquidating notary within the time limits and in the form required by law are taken into account during the operations before the liquidating notary.
